content:
I don't have access to the latest economic data for noida. however, i can provide some general information on the economic situation of the city.

noida, being a hub of it, software and technology-enabled services, has significantly grown in recent years. the city has been consistently ranked among the top cities for business in india. the development of world-class infrastructure, such as excellent connectivity, modern office spaces, residential complexes and recreational facilities, has contributed to noida's rapid growth.

the city's economy is primarily driven by the services sector, which contributes significantly to its gdp. besides it and software services, other services that drive noida's economy are retail, hospitality, real estate and education.

noida is home to several large manufacturing units that produce electronics, textiles, automotive parts and pharmaceuticals. the city also has the largest sez in india, which houses companies from various sectors, including it, ites, biotechnology, and engineering.

overall, the economic situation of noida seems to be optimistic, with a conducive environment for businesses and foreign investors.
